Class SFDCValidationException

Exception
    SFDCValidationException
Direct Known Subclasses:
SFDCAccessControlException
public class SFDCValidationException

This is a basic ValidationException class. It does not add any functionality to the generic Exception class. However, in Apex we must extend the Exception class before using it.
